# Test Cases for Sensitive Word Detection
# Format: input text | expected matches count | description

这是一个正常的文本 | 0 | Normal text
这是一个敏感词 | 1 | Single sensitive word
傻逼和白痴都是不好的词 | 2 | Multiple sensitive words
测试test测试 | 2 | Mixed language
傻@逼 | 1 | With symbol interference
測試 | 1 | Traditional Chinese
sha bi | 1 | Pinyin variant
